```{r}
nutriage <- read.csv("~/Downloads/Atelier4-master/nutriage.csv")
names(nutriage)
```

taille est normale ?

```{r}
mu_taille <- mean(nutriage$taille)
sigma_taille <- sd(nutriage$taille)
mu_taille
sigma_taille
pnorm(0,mu_taille,sigma_taille)
```
Taille $=e^X$ ou$X\sim N(\mu,\sigma)$ alors $X= \ln(\text{Taille})) \sim N(\mu,\sigma)$

```{r}
x<- log(nutriage$taille)
mu_x <-mean(x)
sigma_x<- sd(x)
mu_x
sigma_x
n<-length(x)
n
```
```{r}
z<- (x-mu_x)/sigma_x
t_simul <- rnorm(n)
qqplot(z,t_simul,xlim=c(-3,3),ylim=c(-3,3))
par(new=T)
plot(z,z,type="l",col="red")
```
```{r}
z<- rnorm(n)
t_simul <- rnorm(n)
qqplot(z,t_simul,xlim=c(-3,3),ylim=c(-3,3))
par(new=T)
plot(z,z,type="l",col="red")
```


poids est normal ?

```{r}
mu_poids <- mean(nutriage$poids)
sigma_poids <- sd(nutriage$poids)
mu_poids
sigma_poids
pnorm(0,mu_poids,sigma_poids)
```

Poids $=e^X$ ou$X\sim N(\mu,\sigma)$ alors $X= \ln(\text{Poids})) \sim N(\mu,\sigma)$

```{r}
x<- log(nutriage$poids)
mu_x <-mean(x)
sigma_x<- sd(x)
mu_x
sigma_x
n<-length(x)
n
```

```{r}
z<- (x-mu_x)/sigma_x
t_simul <- rnorm(n)
qqplot(z,t_simul,xlim=c(-3,3),ylim=c(-3,3))
par(new=T)
plot(z,z,type="l",col="red",xlim=c(-3,3),ylim=c(-3,3))
```

```{r}
z<- rnorm(n)
t_simul <- rnorm(n)
qqplot(z,t_simul,xlim=c(-3,3),ylim=c(-3,3))
par(new=T)
plot(z,z,type="l",col="red",xlim=c(-3,3),ylim=c(-3,3))
```
simulation

```{r}
x<- log(nutriage$poids)
mu_x <-mean(x)
sigma_x<- sd(x)
mu_x
sigma_x
simulation <-rnorm(1000,mu_x,sigma_x)
poids_simul <-exp(simulation)
hist(poids_simul)
```
